name: Dumpy & Bumpy
description:
Dumpy & Bumpy is a retro couch co-op friendly character duo puzzle game. You (and optionally- a friend) bite, chomp, push, and throw to solve 80 puzzles across 8 worlds and defeat the evil Ghostlord! ...or duke it out in Battle Mode in 8 themed stages!



80 Levels to complete for you and a friend, or go it solo!
8 Themed Worlds to Complete!
Dodge danger, slide, lift & throw blocks, and blow up bombs!
Varying objectives for each level!
Play cooperatively, or mess with the other player!
VS Battle Mode!
Mind bending puzzles for hours of fun!
Replay puzzles to beat the par times!
Controller support with XInput devices!
